Class AbstractOption

java.lang.Object
  moa.AbstractMOAObject
      moa.options.AbstractOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, MOAObject, Option
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractClassOption, FlagOption, FloatOption, IntOption, ListOption, MultiChoiceOption, StringOption
public abstract class AbstractOption
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements Option

Abstract option.
